import React from 'react' import { gql, useQuery } from '@apollo/client' const ALL_BOOKS = gql` query { allBooks { author title published id genres } } ` const Books = (props) => { const result = useQuery(ALL_BOOKS) const books = result.data ? result.data.allBooks : [] if (!props.show) { return null } return (

books

{books.map(a => )}
author published
{a.title} {a.author} {a.published}
) } export default Books
